member.summary: Operation failed - aborted by user

member.summary: Operation failed - specified file was not found

member.summary: Operation failed - the program is not valid

member.summary: Operation failed - specified item was not found

member.summary: Operation failed - the device timed out

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.AMIConfiguration.IANSIConfiguration.FactoryConfigureICSRegister(System.String)
member.summary: Configures only the register portion of an ICS meter with the specified EDL file and does not display a prompt for dialog.

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.AMIConfiguration.IANSIConfiguration.FactoryConfigureICSCommModule(System.String,System.String,System.UInt16,System.Byte)
member.summary: Configures only the comm module portion of an ICS meter with the specified EDL file and does not display a prompt for dialog.
member.param: Path and filename of the EDL file.
The Gateway IP address of the ICS comm module.
The utility ID used by the ICS comm module for filtering ERT data.
Determines whether or not the ICS comm module puplishes ERT tables in std. table 0.

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.AMIConfiguration.IANSIConfiguration.FactoryConfigureICSCommModule(System.String,System.String,System.UInt16,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures only the comm module portion of an ICS meter with the specified EDL file and does not display a prompt for dialog.
member.param: Path and filename of the EDL file.
The Gateway IP address of the ICS comm module.
The utility ID used by the ICS comm module for filtering ERT data.
Determines whether or not the ICS comm module puplishes ERT tables in std. table 0.

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.AMIConfiguration.IANSIConfiguration.FactoryConfigureICSCommModule(System.String,System.String,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Configures only the comm module portion of a 4G ICM meter with the specified EDL file and does not display a prompt for dialog.
member.param: Path and filename of the EDL file.
The Gateway IP address of the ICM comm module.
The utility ID used by the ICM comm module for filtering ERT data. A value of 0 will indicate utility ID should not be configured.

Loads the EDL file into the table set. Use before any partial configuraitons.
Path and filename of the EDL file. ConfigurationError code. Revison History: MM/DD/YY who Version Issue# Description -------- --- ------- ------ --------------------------------------- 03/09/12 jkw 7.40.00 N/A Created

Loads the EDL file into the table set. Use before any partial configuraitons.
Start table element Start table element index array. null if none. End table element. Must be in the same table End table element index array. null if none. ConfigurationError code.
